name: Default Levels
description: Default level set to enjoy solving

levels.name: Singleton
levels.description: Replace groups of the same letter with a single instance

levels.name: Unary Addition
levels.description: Output the result of the unary addition

levels.name: Remove First 3
levels.description:
Remove the first 3 letters from the word

The word length is always >= 3

levels.name: Alphabetical Sort
levels.description: Sort the letters so all a's appear before b's and all b's appear before c's

levels.name: Unary Subtraction
levels.description:
Output the result of the unary subtraction

The right number will always be smaller to prevent overflows

levels.name: Duplicate
levels.description: Replace every letter with a second copy of the letter

levels.name: Inconsistent Replacement
levels.description:
1. Replace the first instance of 'c' with 'b'
2. Replace all other instances of 'b' with 'a'

levels.name: Caesar Cipher
levels.description: Replace every 'a' with 'b', every 'b' with 'c', and every 'c' with 'a'

levels.name: Trim
levels.description: Remove all 'a' at the start and end of the string

levels.name: Every Other
levels.description:
Remove every other letter from the word, starting with the first letter
(So remove letters 1, 3, 5, etc.)

levels.name: Most Common Letter
levels.description:
Return the most common letter in the word
There will only be one most common letter

winMessage:
Good job solving all of the default levels!

Now try the extreme levels or create your own level pack!
